questions.question: The Atlantic Ocean _________________.

choices.answer: separates Asia and Australia from North and South America
separates Europe and Africa from North and South America
is bounded by Asia, Africa, and Australia
lies south of Asia and separates East Africa from Australia

questions.question: The Atlantic Ocean’s Mid-Atlantic Ridge is part of the longest mountain range on Earth. Which statement is NOT true?

choices.answer: It is a continuous range of underwater volcanoes.
The ridge was created by the movements of Earth’s tectonic plates.
The seafloor is spreading on either side of it.
